movie.title: The Halloween Family
movie.description_intro: It's Mischief Night and Larry the Zombie and Fred the Mummy are down in the dumps, and Fred wants his mummy curse to be lifted. Boo the Bogeyman tells them to meet up with a magical tree named Goul, and they set off, meeting some crazy characters along the way!
movie.description_full: It's Mischief Night and Larry the Zombie and Fred the Mummy are down in the dumps, and Fred wants his mummy curse to be lifted. Boo the Bogeyman tells them to meet up with a magical tree named Goul, and they set off, meeting some crazy characters along the way!

movies.title: The Land Before Time X: The Great Longneck Migration
movies.title_english: The Land Before Time X: The Great Longneck Migration
movies.title_long: The Land Before Time X: The Great Longneck Migration (2003)
movies.summary: A bedtime story leads Littlefoot and his grandparents on a journey to a new land, where Littlefoot discovers someone who vanished before he was born: his father! Now Littlefoot must decide between two worlds. Will he leave to be with his friends in the Great Valley, or stay behind and start a new life with his father? This is the decision that could forever change The Land Before Time saga.
movies.description_full: A bedtime story leads Littlefoot and his grandparents on a journey to a new land, where Littlefoot discovers someone who vanished before he was born: his father! Now Littlefoot must decide between two worlds. Will he leave to be with his friends in the Great Valley, or stay behind and start a new life with his father? This is the decision that could forever change The Land Before Time saga.

This is the decision that could forever change The Land Before Time saga.

movies.title: Sleeping Beauty
movies.summary: After the beautiful Princess Aurora is born into royalty, everyone gathers to celebrate. Everything is perfectly fine until an unwanted guest appears, the evil fairy Maleficent. Maleficent curses the young princess and announces that she will die by pricking her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel before sunset on her 16th birthday. Fortunately, one of the good fairies, Merryweather, changes the spell so Aurora will fall into a deep sleep instead, and the only way to wake her from her sleep is true love's kiss. Finally the day comes.

Finally the day comes.

movies.title: Urusei Yatsura 3: Remember My Love
movies.summary: A curse placed on Lum as an infant manifests itself in the present day, causing her to be taken to another dimension. Lum's husband, Ataru Moroboshi is turned into a hippo, and attempts to find Lum with the help of her friends.

movies.title: Away
movies.summary: A boy and a little bird are on a journey across a strange island trying to get back home.
movies.description_full: A boy and a little bird are on a journey across a strange island trying to get back home.
